Docs.summary: Provides the form adapter class for the XHTML mobile controls adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices. The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlFormAdapter> class provides the adapter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> control.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .
